scripts.check: cd judgeval-java && mvn -B compile checkstyle:check spotless:check
scripts.generate:client: npm run generate:client:raw && npm run format
scripts.ci: cd judgeval-java && mvn -B clean compile test checkstyle:check spotless:check
scripts.status: cd judgeval-java && echo "[status] judgeval-java" && G=$(mvn -q -DforceStdout help:evaluate -Dexpression=project.groupId) && A=$(mvn -q -DforceStdout help:evaluate -Dexpression=project.artifactId) && V=$(mvn -q -DforceStdout help:evaluate -Dexpression=project.version) && echo "GAV: $G:$A:$V" && (ls -1 target/*.jar 2>/dev/null || echo "No jar built")
